list.en: We're willing to keep our business relationship.
list.cn: 我们愿意保持业务关系。

list.en: I'm sure our business dealings will develop quickly and productively.
list.cn: 我相信我们的业务往来会迅速而富有成效地发展。

list.en: We have been doing business with your sister companies in the past few years.
list.cn: 在过去的几年里，我们一直与你们的姐妹公司有业务往来。

list.en: We are preparing to transact business only on these terms.
list.cn: 我们准备只按这些条件成交。

list.en: We hope to expand our business with you.
list.cn: 我们希望与贵公司扩大贸易往来。

list.en: During the past years, we have done a lot of trade with your company.
list.cn: 在过去的几年中，我们与贵公司进行了大量的贸易。

list.en: We would be very happy to start business relations with you.
list.cn: 我们很高兴能与贵公司建立业务关系。

list.en: We've been in this business for eighty years.
list.cn: 我们做这行已经有80年了。

list.en: We desire you to give us an immediate reply.
list.cn: 我们希望你能立即给我们答复。

list.en: This is our new product.
list.cn: 这是我们的新产品。

list.en: Our products are prime quality.
list.cn: 我们的产品质量一流。

list.en: Our new product is elegant and practical.
list.cn: 我们的新产品美观实用。

list.en: This type of our product is very popular in domestic market.
list.cn: 我们的这种产品在国内市场上很畅销。

list.en: We have a wide selection of this product.
list.cn: 这种产品我们有很多选择。

list.en: This kind of product is attractive and durable.
list.cn: 这种产品美观耐用。

list.en: We have won Praise from customers.
list.cn: 我们赢得了客户的一致好评。

list.en: Our products have won a high admiration and are widely trusted at home and abroad.
list.cn: 我们的产品在国内外赢得了高度的赞誉和广泛的信赖。

list.en: Quality is first and consumers are the most important.
list.cn: 质量第一，消费者至上。

list.en: What's the unit price for this kind of items?
list.cn: 这种产品的单价是多少?

list.en: How long does your offer remain valid?
list.cn: 你们报盘的有效期是多长?

list.en: Other suppliers are offering a much better price.
list.cn: 其他供应商提供的价格要便宜得多。

list.en: I hope you could offer us your best price.
list.cn: 我希望你能给我们最优惠的价格。

list.en: Enquiries for carpets are getting more numerous.
list.cn: 对地毯的询盘越来越多。

list.en: We cannot take care of your inquiry at the moment.
list.cn: 我们现在无法顾及你方的询盘。

list.en: We can take care of your enquiry at the present.
list.cn: 我们现在可以考虑你方的询盘。

list.en: As soon as the price picks up, enquiries will revive.
list.cn: 价格一回升，询盘就会恢复。

list.en: Our price is competitive enough to induce business.
list.cn: 我们的价格很有竞争力，足以促成交易。

list.en: We have received substantial inquiries for bicycles.
list.cn: 我们已收到大量关于自行车的询盘。

list.en: Here's my inquiry list.
list.cn: 这是我的询价单。

list.en: We can offer you a quotation based upon the international market.
list.cn: 我们可以按国际市场价格给你方报价。

list.en: We can't hold the offer any longer.
list.cn: 我们不能再保留报盘了。

list.en: We are pleased to quote you for the goods as follows.
list.cn: 我们很高兴就该商品向你方报价如下。

list.en: My offer was based on reasonable profit, not on wild speculations.
list.cn: 我的报价以合理利润为依据，不是漫天要价。

list.en: I'm waiting for your offer.
list.cn: 我在等你的报价。

list.en: Here is our latest c price.
list.cn: 这是我们的最新价格。

list.en: The prices of the commodities will change with seasons.
list.cn: 商品的价格会随着季节的变化而变化。

list.en: We'll let you have the official letter next monday.
list.cn: 下周一我们会给你正式信函。

list.en: We have the offer ready for you.
list.cn: 我们已经为你准备好报盘了。

list.en: It's necessary to check the contract closely before you signing.
list.cn: 在签字之前有必要仔细检查一下合同。

list.en: We signed a contract of wheat.
list.cn: 我们签订了一份小麦合同。

list.en: Whether we always make a contract for every deal.
list.cn: 我们是否总是为每笔交易订立合同。

list.en: The contract will come into force when it is signed by both parties.
list.cn: 本合同经双方签字后生效。

list.en: You should draw up a contract.
list.cn: 你应该起草一份合同。

list.en: What the term of this contract?
list.cn: 这份合同的期限是多长?

list.en: Would you mind if we make a three year contract?
list.cn: 你介意我们订一个三年的合同吗?

list.en: We can get the contract finalized now.
list.cn: 我们现在可以把合同定稿了。

list.en: What clause do you require in the contract?
list.cn: 你要求在合同中订什么条款?

list.en: This is our contract.
list.cn: 这是我们的合同。

list.en: Have you got any questions in regards to the contract?
list.cn: 你对合同有什么问题吗?

list.en: We should include an arbitration clause in the contract.
list.cn: 我们应该在合同中加入仲裁条款。

list.en: My advice would be not to sign the contract.
list.cn: 我的建议是不要签合同。

list.en: Will you accept special order?
list.cn: 你们接受特殊订货吗?

list.en: What's the minimum quantity of the order for your goods?
list.cn: 你们商品的最低订量是多少?

list.en: When would you be able to ship it?
list.cn: 你们什么时候能发货?

list.en: How many do you intend to order?
list.cn: 你们打算订多少?

list.en: We'll order 2000 suits.
list.cn: 我们要订2000套西装。

list.en: I hope this order is followed by many other orders.
list.cn: 我希望这个订单之后会有更多的订单。

list.en: We'll send our official order today.
list.cn: 我们今天会发出正式订单。

list.en: Do you usually buy in large quantities?
list.cn: 你们通常大量购买吗?

list.en: Can you accept this order?
list.cn: 你能接受这个订单吗?

list.en: Thank you for your order.
list.cn: 谢谢您的订单。

list.en: We are inclined to place large orders with you.
list.cn: 我们倾向于向你方大量订购。

list.en: Could you adopt da or dp?
list.cn: 你能采用da还是dp吗?

list.en: Can you make a concession on the terms of the payment?
list.cn: 你们能在付款条件上做些让步吗?

list.en: We would adopt the terms of payment by instalment for present purchase.
list.cn: 对于目前的购买，我们将采用分期付款的方式。

list.en: Please tell me your payment terms.
list.cn: 请告诉我你们的付款条件。

list.en: Will you intend to use letter of credit as the term of payment?
list.cn: 你们打算用信用证付款方式吗?

list.en: What mode of payment do you want to employ?
list.cn: 你想用什么方式付款?

list.en: Our customers demand the credit amount to be paid at sight.
list.cn: 我方客户要求即期支付信用证金额。

list.en: What about the outer packing?
list.cn: 外包装是怎样的?

list.en: How are you going to pack?
list.cn: 你打算怎么收拾行李?

list.en: Generally speaking, buyers bear the charges of packing.
list.cn: 包装费用一般由买方负担。

list.en: Buyers always pay great attention to packing.
list.cn: 买方总是很注意包装。

list.en: We usually use airtight plastic bags for packing.
list.cn: 我们通常用密封塑料袋包装。

list.en: I want the most economical packing.
list.cn: 我要最经济的包装。

list.en: How much will the new packing add to the cost price?
list.cn: 新包装要增加多少成本?

list.en: It is necessary to improve the packaging.
list.cn: 有必要改进包装。

list.en: Packing also affects the reputation of our products.
list.cn: 包装也影响我们产品的声誉。

list.en: Packing is closely connected to sales.
list.cn: 包装直接关系到产品的销路。

list.en: Can you effect shipments of the order in july?
list.cn: 你们能在7月份装运这批货吗?

list.en: How long will the delivery take from here to Australia by sea freight?
list.cn: 从这里到澳大利亚的海运需要多长时间?

list.en: We ship most of our oil in bulk.
list.cn: 我们装运的油大多是散装的。

list.en: I hope that the goods shall be shipped promptly after you get or LLC.
list.cn: 我希望货物在你方获得有限责任公司后立即装运。

list.en: An early reply from you will help us to speed up shipment.
list.cn: 贵方早日答复将有助于我方加快装运。

list.en: When is the earliest possible day you can ship the goods?
list.cn: 你们最早什么时候可以发货?

list.en: Could you manage to hasten the delivery?
list.cn: 你们能尽快交货吗?

list.en: The goods are ready for shipment.
list.cn: 货物已准备好待运。

list.en: Excuse me, what is the earliest shipment you can make?
list.cn: 对不起，你们最早什么时候能交货?

list.en: We've had a lot of trouble in the past with damaged goods.
list.cn: 我们过去有过很多货物损坏的麻烦。

list.en: The insurance was supposed to be included in the quotation.
list.cn: 保险应该包含在报价单里。

list.en: What is the insurance premium?
list.cn: 保险费是多少?

list.en: Are there any other clauses in Marine policies?
list.cn: 海运险还有其他条款吗?

list.en: The risk of breakage is covered by Marine insurance, isn't it?
list.cn: 破碎险是包括在海洋运输货物险之内的，对吗?

list.en: Please fill in the application form.
list.cn: 请填写一下申请表。

list.en: What kind of insurance are you able to provide for my consignment?
list.cn: 你们能为我的这批货保什么险?

list.en: What insurance will you take?
list.cn: 你要买什么保险?

list.en: Which company do you insure with?
list.cn: 你向哪家公司投保?

list.en: What types of insurance do you accept?
list.cn: 你们接受什么类型的保险?

list.en: Is it possible to effect shipment during july?
list.cn: 有可能在7月份装船吗?

list.en: Could you possibly affect the shipment more promptly?
list.cn: 你们能不能提前一点交货?

list.en: I'm sorry we can't advance the time of shipment.
list.cn: 很抱歉，我们不能提前交货。

list.en: We got a damaged shipment from you.
list.cn: 我们收到了你们寄来的破损货物。

list.en: How bad was the damage?
list.cn: 损坏有多严重?

list.en: Can you give me the time of delivery?
list.cn: 你能告诉我交货时间吗?

list.en: Please make sure you can deliver the goods on time.
list.cn: 请确保你们能按时交货。

list.en: What's your last word as to the date?
list.cn: 你对日期的最后决定是什么时候?

list.en: When could you make a delivery?
list.cn: 你们什么时候可以交货?

list.en: We don't sacrifice quality for quick profits.
list.cn: 我们不会为了急功近利而牺牲质量。

list.en: Could we check these samples?
list.cn: 我们可以检查一下这些样品吗?

list.en: The quality of the products we ordered is in accordance with the catalog.
list.cn: 我们订购的产品质量与目录上的相符。

list.en: The order this time doesn't work out too well.
list.cn: 这次的顺序不太好。

list.en: The goods are available in different qualities.
list.cn: 此货有多种不同的质量可供。

list.en: The quality is all right.
list.cn: 质量无问题。

list.en: We sincerely hope the quality is in conformity with the contract stipulations.
list.cn: 我们真诚希望质量与合同规定相符。

list.en: Our quality is based solely on our sales samples.
list.cn: 我们的质量完全以货样为准。

list.en: I'm not satisfied with the quality of these goods at all.
list.cn: 我对这些商品的质量一点也不满意。

list.en: The goods supplied by you are below the quality we required.
list.cn: 你方提供的货物质量低于我方所要求的。

list.en: You should take steps to avoid the inferior quality for the goods.
list.cn: 你们应采取措施避免货物质量低劣。

list.en: Please make sure there are no more mistakes.
list.cn: 请确保不再有错误。

list.en: You should be responsible for all the losses resulting from the delayed shipment.
list.cn: 你方应对延误装运造成的一切损失负责。

list.en: We wish you can make the disposal of our claims as soon as possible.
list.cn: 我们希望你们能尽快处理我们的索赔。

list.en: Can you do anything about the goods ship mistakenly?
list.cn: 你能解决货物装船错误的问题吗?

list.en: We make a claim for the loss we have sustained.
list.cn: 我们对所遭受的损失提出索赔。

list.en: We have to put in a claim against you for all the losses sustained.
list.cn: 我们不得不就所遭受的一切损失向你方提出索赔。

list.en: We find each case shows a shortage in quantity.
list.cn: 我们发现每箱都有数量短缺。

list.en: We'll look into it right away for you.
list.cn: 我们马上为您调查。

list.en: How bad was the damage?
list.cn: 损坏有多严重?

list.en: Did you note the damage on the Bill of lading?
list.cn: 你在提单上注明损坏情况了吗?

list.en: The warranty period is one year.
list.cn: 保修期为一年。

list.en: Is it possible to extend the period of warranty?
list.cn: 有可能延长保修期吗?

list.en: You can refund it with one week.
list.cn: 你可以在一周内退款。

list.en: All repairs are free within the warranty periods.
list.cn: 保修期内所有维修均免费。

list.en: We'll send a person to repair it immediately.
list.cn: 我们马上派人去修理。

list.en: Can you show me your receipt and let me check it?
list.cn: 请出示您的收据，让我查一下好吗?

list.en: We need feedback from our customers.
list.cn: 我们需要客户的反馈。

list.en: What kind of after sale services does your company provide?
list.cn: 贵公司提供什么样的售后服务?
